level.text: The amount of the subsidy an applicant is eligible to receive shall be within five percent (5%) (no less than 95% and no more than 105%) of the regular daily rate of the subsidy for a long-term permanent Level 1 guardianship subsidy pursuant to Title 29 DCMR Chapter 61, less any TANF or Supplemental Security Income (SSI) benefits received for the child.
The subsidy shall expire after one (1) year unless the recipient is recertified in accordance with ยง 6808.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 5837 (July 21, 2006); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 12482 (December 12, 2008).
